Tezos protocol.description: Granada, the recently injected protocol upgrade for Tezos, safely brings 2x faster block times, liquidity baking, and the already low gas costs reduced even further by approximately 80%.
Interested in developing on Tezos? SmartPy is a Python library for building and analyzing Tezos smart contracts.
Tezos' next protocol upgrade, Granada, will introduce Emmy* - bringing faster finality on the path to Tenderbake.

Development.description: VR company "Virtualware" joins the Tezos ecosystem in a partnership with Kalamint focusing on bringing NFTs to Virtual Reality.

Music-focused NFT marketplace "OneOf" plans to launch on Tezos and will feature NFTs from Quincy Jones, Whitney Houston, Doja Cat, John Legend, TLC, Charlie Puth, Jacob Collier, G-Eazy, Alesso, and other stars.
Popular Tezos NFT platform Hic et Nunc is having its first hackathon ("Hicathon") this weekend.

Ecosystem.description: Equisafe & Pour Que Marseille Vive! association announce the first clean NFT of a physical art piece on Tezos blockchain in France.
Red Bull Racing utilizes the Tezos blockchain to build its first ever NFT fan experience.
Tezos Commons announced April's winners for the Community Reward Program.
